title: 第四版搭载了全新战斗机制的Java版快照现已放出
author: Halcyon_Suoh
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Halcyon_Suoh 于 2020-1-5 11:53 编辑 
Happy Thanksgiving! Time for the fourth test snapshot of new combat mechanics! This time the snapshot is based on version 1.15 of Minecraft, but is still not compatible with the 1.15 pre-releases!感恩节快乐！第四版战斗机制快照现已发布，这次的战斗机制快照基于MC1.15做改动，但一如既往，该版本不与1.15预发布版兼容！I'm very grateful for all feedback and comments. This time I actually made a few dramatic changes that hopefully will allow for a snappier and more varied PvP experience.对于你们的反馈，我们表示十分感谢，该版本改动幅度相对较大，我们希望这些改动可以让pvp变的稍微那么灵活多变一点。Whenever I get the "just revert to 1.8", my eyes roll a full 360 in their sockets... I have to design a system that works well both in PvE and PvP, and well on touch and controller as well as mouse-and-keyboard. It will never be 100% equal for everyone, but I will at least try something that works OK in most scenarios while still giving some design flexibility.当我每次听到"把战斗系统回滚到1.8就完了"这种反馈时，我都会不由自主地翻个白眼，这世界需要一个同时兼容键鼠以及手柄触摸板的、能在PVE及PVP里工作良好的的战斗机制。当然，这种战斗机制永远做不到人人平等，但我们会在保留一些设计灵活性的同时尽力让它在绝大多数情况下能给出不错的游戏体验。However, it's great when people pinpoint exactly what it is they're missing the most from 1.8 PvP gameplay. Could be w-tapping, item combos, fishing poles, or something else. If you are passionate about a specific detail you should definitely make yourself heard.但是，明确指出自己 到底喜欢1.8pvp中的哪一点绝对是好事，可能是w-tapping，可能是用奇怪的物品实现的连击，当然，还有没人会忘记的钓竿，或者，是什么别的东西。如果你十分喜欢某些1.8pvp中的元素并不想让它们成为时泪的话，可以在原帖下方回复，或者使用我们的反馈站来提供您宝贵的意见。
First of all, some basic combat changes:基础改动：
The attack timer now only resets when you actually perform an attack (it's unaffected by switching items)伤害决定条现不会因切换物品而重置Critical attacks (jump-attacks) will now trigger at 100% (no need to wait)会心一击(跳劈)现可在伤害决定条充能至100%时发动Knockback attacks (sprint-attacks) will now trigger at 100%击退攻击(冲刺砍)现可在伤害决定条充能至100%时发动Default attack reach has been decreased by 0.5 (to 2.5 blocks)默认攻击距离现为2.5格远The full timer ("200%") attack now has +1.0 reach (was 0.5)当伤害决定条充能至200%时发动的攻击的攻击距离将会增加1格Arrow accuracy has been increased ("uncertainty" value decreased from 1.0 to 0.25)弓箭精准度提升

Some shield changes:盾牌改动：
Added an option to disable the use-shield-on-crouch (it's in the accessibility menu)现可在辅助功能设置里开关"潜行同时使用盾牌格挡"功能Removed the option to hide the shield移除"格挡时隐藏盾牌"选项

Some trident parity changes:三叉戟改动：
Tridents can be shot from dispensers三叉戟现可由发射器射出Tridents with Loyalty that fall into the void will return to its owner带有"忠诚"魔咒的三叉戟现可在被掷入虚空后返回其投掷者Tridents with Impaler now deal enchantment damage to all mobs that are in water or rain带有"穿刺"魔咒的三叉戟现可对水中/雨中的生物造成额外伤害
Some random snowball changes:雪球改动：
Snowballs now stack to 64雪球现为64个一组Snowballs have a 4 tick cooldown雪球现有4游戏刻的冷却时间Snowballs are not rendered the first 2 ticks (hack to prevent screen flickering)雪球被掷出后的前二游戏刻不会被渲染

Axe enchantments:斧子魔咒改动：
All damage enchantments can be applied to axes in the enchanting table所有伤害相关的魔咒现可由附魔台附至斧上Chopping hasn't been changed (I point this out because there was a lot of Chopping feedback)"Chopping"魔咒暂未改动
First post here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/c5mqwv/a_custom_java_edition_snapshot_to_test_new_combat/Second post here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecra ... apshot_to_test_new/Third post here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/dq2v7o/updated_combat_test_snapshot_number_3_and_a/第一版战斗更新:https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-877533-1-1.html第二版战斗更新:https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-903035-1-1.html第三版战斗更新:https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-923578-1-1.html
Installation instructions:安装步骤:
在此网址下载该压缩文件：https://launcher.mojang.com/experiments/combat/ac11ea96f3bb2fa2b9b76ab1d20cacb1b1f7ef60/1_15_combat-1.zip在您的"version"文件夹中解压此压缩文件(若不知到它在哪，烦请继续阅读)在您的启动器中创建一个新的配置并且选中版本"1_15_combat-1"点击"开始游戏"，剩余的所需内容应会被自动下载记得在一个新的世界开始游戏！该版本不与其他快照兼容！
Finding the Minecraft application folder:如何找到你的Minecraft安装文件夹:
Windows:点击Windows徽标键+R组合键，并在弹出的窗口内键入"%appdata%/.minecraft"后点击确定Mac OS X:打开访达，在菜单中选择前往，然后选择前往文件夹并键入~/Library/Application Support/minecraftLinux:其位于路径~/.minecraft or /home/<your username>/.minecraft/
Once you have the launcher set up you can download the server files from there as well.若你已在启动器成功安装该快照后，你可以在启动器中下载服务端文件。
FEEDBACK SITE反馈站
In addition to replying here on reddit, you can head over to the feedback site to discuss specific topics here: https://aka.ms/JavaCombatSnap除了在原帖下方回复之外，也可在我们的反馈站内讨论Cheers!祝游玩愉快！

Finding the Minecraft application folder:
如何找到你的Minecraft安装文件夹:

Windows:点击Ctrl+R组合键，并在弹出的窗口内键入"%appdata%/.minecraft"后点击确定
Mac OS X:打开访达，在菜单中选择前往，然后选择前往文件夹并键入~/Library/Application Support/minecraft
Linux:其位于路径~/.minecraft or /home/<your username>/.minecraft/
这里是不是错了，Windows的应该是Windows+R组合键
